name: Sock Talk
description:
Sock Talk tells a story of two close friends, whose friendship has experienced hard times lately. Fortunately they finally decided to talk and give each other one more chance.

By matching falling block by either color or shape the players are picking words to be said. When the conversation goes well, the two friends get a little closer. Make them meet at the center to repair their bonds and win the game. Be careful though as each badly chosen word will hurt the other person and cause her to step away.

The game can be played either by one or two players.

Game made for Global Game Jam 2020.
